targets.query: SELECT last("amp")  FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT sum("kwh") as "kwhd" FROM ( SELECT sum("watt") / 1000 * mode("time") / 3600 as "kwh" FROM ( SELECT elapsed(mean("power"),1s) as "time", mean("power") as "watt" FROM "power" WHERE ("deviceId" =~ /^$device$/) AND "trange" = 'FVZ' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_s) ) GROUP BY time(1h) )  GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("kwh") as "kwhd" FROM ( SELECT sum("watt") / 1000 * mode("time") / 3600 as "kwh" FROM ( SELECT elapsed(mean("power"),1s) as "time", mean("power") as "watt" FROM "power" WHERE ("deviceId" =~ /^$device$/) AND "trange" = 'VZ' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_s) ) GROUP BY time(1h) )  GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") + ( ( sum("price") + last("daily_price") ) * ($price_iva / 100) ) FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT last("watt_offpeek") - last("watt_peek") as "result" FROM (SELECT last("watt_peek") as "watt_peek" FROM (SELECT last("power") as "watt_peek" FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^main$/) AND $timeFilter AND "tarif" = 'peak' GROUP BY time($sample_seconds) fill(previous))),(SELECT last("watt_offpeek") as "watt_offpeek" FROM (SELECT last("power") as "watt_offpeek" FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^main$/) AND $timeFilter AND "tarif" = 'offpeak' GROUP BY time($sample_seconds) fill(previous))) fill(0)
SELECT "kwh_price" FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "daily_price" FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "price" + ( "price" * ($price_iva / 100) ) FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT sum("kwh") as "kwh" FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/)  AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "invoice_month", "invoice_year"
SELECT sum("price") as "price" FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/)  AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "invoice_month", "invoice_year"

SELECT mean("power") FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND tarif = 'offpeak' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("power") FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND tarif = 'peak' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT cumulative_sum("kwh") FROM (SELECT sum("watt") / 1000 * mode("time") / 3600 as "kwh" FROM ( SELECT elapsed(mean("power"),1s) as "time", mean("power") as "watt" FROM "power" WHERE ("deviceId" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_s) ) GROUP BY time(1h) )

SELECT mean("power") FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE  ("device_type" != 'main') AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean("power") FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ( "invoice_year" !~ /^$invoice_year$/ OR "invoice_month" !~ /^$invoice_month$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT "power" FROM "power" WHERE ("deviceId" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "power" FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND "power" > 0

SELECT "power" FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "result" FROM (SELECT (sum("ref_cons_offpeak") + sum("ref_cons_peak") + $price_ref_daily) - (sum("cons") + last("daily_price")) as "result" FROM (SELECT sum("kwh") * last("kwh_price") as cons, last("daily_price") as "daily_price" FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), * fill(null)), (SELECT sum("kwh") * $price_ref_kwh_peak as ref_cons_peak FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND tarif='peak' GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("kwh") * $price_ref_kwh_offpeak as ref_cons_offpeak FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND tarif='offpeak' GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null))

SELECT "result" FROM (SELECT (sum("ref_cons_offpeak") + sum("ref_cons_peak") + $price_ref_daily) - (sum("cons") + last("daily_price")) as "result" FROM (SELECT sum("kwh") * last("kwh_price") as cons, last("daily_price") as "daily_price" FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), * fill(null)), (SELECT sum("kwh") * $price_ref_kwh_peak as ref_cons_peak FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND tarif='peak' GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("kwh") * $price_ref_kwh_offpeak as ref_cons_offpeak FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter AND tarif='offpeak' GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null))

SELECT sum("kwh") * $price_kwh_fvz FROM ( SELECT sum("watt") / 1000 * mode("time")  / 3600 as "kwh" FROM ( SELECT elapsed(mean("power"),1s) as "time", mean("power") as "watt" FROM "power" WHERE ("deviceId" =~ /^$device$/) AND "trange" = 'FVZ' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_s) ) GROUP BY time(1h)  )  GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("kwh") * $price_kwh_vz FROM ( SELECT sum("watt") / 1000 * mode("time")  / 3600 as "kwh" FROM ( SELECT elapsed(mean("power"),1s) as "time", mean("power") as "watt" FROM "power" WHERE ("deviceId" =~ /^$device$/) AND "trange" = 'VZ' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_s) ) GROUP BY time(1h) )  GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/ AND "invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/ AND "invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

SELECT count("watt") * last("daily_price")  FROM ( SELECT mean("power") as "watt", last("daily_price") as "daily_price" FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) ) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/ AND ( "invoice_year" !~ /^$invoice_year$/ OR "invoice_month" !~ /^$invoice_month$/ )) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") FROM "raw_data"."power" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("price") + last("daily_price") FROM "storage"."power_d" WHERE ("device_type" =~ /^$device$/) AND ("invoice_year" =~ /^$invoice_year$/) AND ("invoice_month" =~ /^$invoice_month$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
